content: yo k2tog k2tog *yo k2tog* repeat until last 2 sts k2tog round 4 k ssk k until last 2 sts k2tog round 5 *yo k2tog* round 6 k work rounds 3-6 a total of 6 times 26-30-35-38 sts remaining work rounds 5-6 46 more times work rounds 3-4 one more time work rounds 5-6 5 more times work *p1 k1tbl* for 5 rounds bind off with a stretchy bind off work the second arm the same way weave in the ends and you re done
